attributes.action: Halt lockdown and restrictions until covid19 is isolated to the Gold Standard
attributes.additional_details:
The lockdown is destroying lives and families along with their livelihood for a virus that hasn’t even been isolated and proven to the “Gold Standard” to exist.
The tests gives false positive results... causing unnecessary hardship to the country.
attributes.background: Stop lockdowns, all restrictions on rights, and all mandatory rules regarding the Coronavirus until covid 19 has been fully isolated to the “Gold Standard” and has a reliable test that doesn’t give false positive results.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by 'gold standard' to further prove the existence of Covid-19. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979
